mapper.select: SELECT wnc.`Depts` deptIDStr, wnc.`Users` userIDStr, wnc.`WarnLevel` warnLevelStr, wnc.`NotifyMethod` notifyMethodStr, CONCAT('[',GROUP_CONCAT(ncpr.ProjectID),']') projectIDStr FROM tb_warn_notify_config wnc LEFT JOIN tb_notify_config_project_relation ncpr ON ncpr.`NotifyConfigID`=wnc.`ID` WHERE wnc.`ID`=#{id} AND wnc.`CompanyID`=#{companyID} AND wnc.`Platform`=#{platform} GROUP BY wnc.`ID`

SELECT wnc.`ID` id, wnc.`NotifyMethod` notifyMethod, wnc.`Users` users, wnc.`Depts` depts, wnc.`WarnLevel` warnLevel, ncpr.`ProjectID` projectID FROM `tb_warn_notify_config` wnc LEFT JOIN `tb_notify_config_project_relation` ncpr ON wnc.`ID` = ncpr.`NotifyConfigID` WHERE wnc.`CompanyID`=#{companyID} AND wnc.`Platform`=#{platform} AND wnc.`NotifyType`=#{notifyType} ORDER BY wnc.CreateTime DESC
